DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Sets the entity to descend to the given depth, and explodes it when it reaches that depth.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>explode_at_depth</myVariableName> <myType>depth</myType> <myLabel>Depth</myLabel> <myToolTip>Depth at which the charge will explode.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
